parameters.name: NewModelPathName
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the replacement model

parameters.name: Views
parameters.description: Array of IView s in which to replace the model

parameters.name: Instances
parameters.description: Array of IComponent2 s that are specific instances of the model to replace in the drawing

title: IDrawingDoc.ReplaceViewModel
description: Replaces the specified instances of a model in the specified drawing views.
signature:
System.Boolean ReplaceViewModel( 
   System.String
NewModelPathName
,
   System.Object
Views
,
   System.Object
Instances
)

parameters.name: NewModelPathName
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the replacement model

parameters.name: Views
parameters.description: Array of IView s in which to replace the model

parameters.name: Instances
parameters.description: Array of IComponent2 s that are specific instances of the model to replace in the drawing

returns: True if the model is replaced, false if not
remarks:
This method corresponds to
Tools > Replace Model
.
